Articles.Content:
With career mode out for sometime now, the wonder what every ones first craft? How far it went, how fast, and how long? and how much science?

I'll start first,

Javascript is disabled. View full album

go forth and post!

Mine was simple.

Command pod

Four fuel tanks

An engine

Two boosters on each side

Three parachutes

I got it to about 250,000 meters, and about 50 science.

Also, why is this labeled "mod craft"?
An LV-T30, nine T200 tanks, a capsule, and a parachute. Orbit.
